summary: The document is an identification form related to the JFK assassination system, specifically an agent report concerning Robert Scheer, a pre-inductee, dated October 19, 1958. It details an employment investigation at the Repeat-0-Type Stencil Manufacturing Company in Brooklyn, New York, revealing Scheer's employment details, residence, and social security number. The document was reviewed by the FBI and released with restrictions.
key_findings: Document pertains to the JFK assassination system and involves an investigation into Robert Scheer.
Scheer was employed at the Repeat-0-Type Stencil Manufacturing Company from June 1955, earning $1.00 per hour.
The document was classified as unclassified and released with deletions after FBI review.
Investigation was conducted by Special Agent Paul F. Rohde of the 108th CIC Group.
